arts.ttl: Chelsea hatch Lautaro Martinez transfer plan as Blues 'to offer three players' for Inter Milan striker
arts.sum: Chelsea are reportedly willing to offer three players to Inter Milan in exchange for Argentinian striker Lautaro Martinez.

arts.ttl: Atalanta show their mettle at Lazio to keep in-form Inter off Serie A summit
arts.sum: Marco Brescianini scores in 88th minute to earn 1-1 draw Martínez ends drought in Inter’s 3-0 win at Cagliari Atalanta’s 11-match winning streak in Serie A ended with a 1-1 draw at Lazio, but Marco Brescianini’s 88th-minute equaliser kept them top of the table. Fourth-placed Lazio dominated the first half in Rome and were rewarded in the 27th minute when Nicolò Rovella played a high through ball to Fisayo Dele-Bashiru, who cut inside the box and sent a bouncing volley into the net to break. But Gian Piero Gasperini’s relentless side kept pushing and earned a draw in a thrilling finish to the game. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Lautaro Martinez ends goal drought as Inter keep pressure on Serie A leaders
arts.sum: Martinez had gone eight matches since last finding the back of the net against Venezia on November 3.

arts.ttl: Atalanta’s Tony D’Amico: ‘Inter don’t pressure us’
arts.sum: Tony D'Amico, the sporting director of Atalanta, spoke to Sky before the team's match against Lazio, reflecting on their recent performances and the upcoming challenges. His comments came in light of Inter Milan's recent 3-0 victory over Cagliari, which has put pressure on other teams in the league. The post Atalanta’s Tony D’Amico: ‘Inter don’t pressure us’ appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Simone Inzaghi: ‘Winning the Champions League? We know we are Inter’
arts.sum: Inter Milan, coach Simone Inzaghi addressed the media following his team's impressive 3-0 victory over Cagliari, marking their fifth consecutive win in Serie A and temporarily placing them at the top of the league table. In an interview with DAZN, Inzaghi shared insights on the match, the team's objectives, and individual player performances. The post Simone Inzaghi: ‘Winning the Champions League? We know we are Inter’ appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Cagliari 0-3 Inter: Match Report
arts.sum: Inter Milan secured a convincing 3-0 victory over Cagliari, showcasing their dominance through effective set plays and marking a significant moment as Lautaro Martinez ended his Serie A goal drought, which had lasted nearly two months. The post Serie A | Cagliari 0-3 Inter: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.
